features.name: url_length
features.description: Total length of the URL

features.name: hostname_length
features.description: Length of the hostname part of the URL

features.name: path_length
features.description: Length of the path part of the URL

features.name: query_length
features.description: Length of the query part of the URL

features.name: domain_length
features.description: Length of the domain (without subdomains or TLD)

features.name: tld_length
features.description: Length of the top-level domain

features.name: has_ip
features.description: Whether the URL contains an IP address instead of a domain name

features.name: has_at_symbol
features.description: Whether the URL contains '@' symbol

features.name: count_dots
features.description: Number of dots in the URL

features.name: count_hyphens
features.description: Number of hyphens in the URL

features.name: count_slashes
features.description: Number of forward slashes in the URL

features.name: count_underscores
features.description: Number of underscores in the URL

features.name: count_question_marks
features.description: Number of question marks in the URL

features.name: count_equals
features.description: Number of equals signs in the URL

features.name: count_ampersands
features.description: Number of ampersands in the URL

features.name: count_percent
features.description: Number of percent signs (%) in the URL

features.name: count_semicolons
features.description: Number of semicolons in the URL

features.name: count_colons
features.description: Number of colons in the URL

features.name: count_brackets
features.description: Number of brackets ((), [], {}) in the URL

features.name: count_plus
features.description: Number of plus signs in the URL

features.name: count_asterisk
features.description: Number of asterisks in the URL

features.name: count_digits
features.description: Number of digits in the URL

features.name: count_uppercase
features.description: Number of uppercase letters in the URL

features.name: count_lowercase
features.description: Number of lowercase letters in the URL

features.name: special_char_count
features.description: Number of special characters not including common URL separators (./-_:?)

features.name: digit_ratio
features.description: Ratio of digits to total URL length

features.name: uppercase_ratio
features.description: Ratio of uppercase letters to total URL length

features.name: hostname_digit_ratio
features.description: Ratio of digits to hostname length

features.name: path_digit_ratio
features.description: Ratio of digits to path length

features.name: vowel_consonant_ratio
features.description: Ratio of vowels to total alphabetic characters in the URL

features.name: unique_char_ratio
features.description: Ratio of unique characters to total URL length

features.name: numeric_domain_ratio
features.description: Ratio of digits in the domain (excluding dots)

features.name: subdomain_count
features.description: Number of subdomains in the URL

features.name: max_segment_length
features.description: Maximum length of hostname segments (parts between dots)

features.name: avg_segment_length
features.description: Average length of hostname segments

features.name: path_depth
features.description: Number of directories in the path

features.name: query_params
features.description: Number of parameters in the query string

features.name: max_consecutive_digits
features.description: Maximum number of consecutive digits in the URL

features.name: max_consecutive_letters
features.description: Maximum number of consecutive letters in the URL

features.name: url_entropy
features.description: Shannon entropy of characters in the URL (measure of randomness)

features.name: hostname_entropy
features.description: Shannon entropy of characters in the hostname

features.name: path_entropy
features.description: Shannon entropy of characters in the path

features.name: uses_https
features.description: Whether the URL uses HTTPS protocol

features.name: suspicious_words
features.description: Count of suspicious words in the URL (login, secure, account, bank, verify)

features.name: shortening_service
features.description: Whether the URL uses a known URL shortening service

features.name: suspicious_tld
features.description: Whether the URL uses a TLD associated with phishing/malicious sites
